meanings.definition: Prepare and issue (a book, journal, etc.) for public sale.
meanings.sent1: She is publishing her first novel next month.
meanings.sent2: The company is publishing a new magazine every week.
meanings.sent3: The author was so excited about publishing her work that she danced around the room.
meanings.sent4: The news of the discovery spread like wildfire after publishing the article.
meanings.sent5: Publishing a book is like sharing a piece of your soul with the world.

meanings.definition: The business or profession of the commercial production and issuance of literature, information, musical scores, or sometimes recordings.
meanings.sent1: She works in the publishing industry and loves it.
meanings.sent2: Publishing involves a lot of creativity and hard work.
meanings.sent3: The publishing company threw a party to celebrate their latest bestseller.
meanings.sent4: In the world of publishing, timing is everything.
meanings.sent5: The history of publishing dates back centuries, shaping our culture along the way.
